gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core

Class ExpressionRecognition

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core.ExpressionRecognition

  • public class ExpressionRecognition
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods to identify various types of pronouns and NPs that can corefer to other entities/events in a Document.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExpressionRecognition() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void annotate(Document doc)
      Annotates a Document with coreferential mentions, reads the types to consider come from the configuration.
      static void annotateDefiniteNPs(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with definite NPs (e.g., the agent).
      static void annotateDemonstrativeNPs(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with demonstrative NPs (e.g., these medications).
      static void annotateDemonstrativePronouns(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with demonstrative pronouns (e.g., these, that).
      static void annotateDistributiveNPs(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with distributive NPs (e.g., each patient).
      static void annotateDistributivePronouns(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with distributive pronouns (e.g., each, both).
      static void annotateIndefiniteNPs(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with indefinite NPs (e.g., a disease).
      static void annotateIndefinitePronouns(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with indefinite pronouns (e.g., all, any).
      static void annotatePersonalPronouns(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with personal pronouns (e.g., it, they).
      static void annotatePossessivePronouns(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with possessive pronouns (e.g., its, their).
      static void annotateReciprocalPronouns(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with reciprocal pronouns (e.g., one another).
      static void annotateRelativePronouns(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with relative pronouns (e.g., which, that).
      static void annotateZeroArticleNPs(Sentence sent)
      Annotates a Sentence object with bare (zero-article) NPs (e.g., drug).
      static CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory getCoreferenceSemanticItemFactory(Document doc)
      Gets a semantic item factory associated with a Document object, capable of generating Expression objects.
      static ExpressionType getMentionType(SurfaceElement surf)
      Determines the mention type of a textual unit.

    • Method Detail

      • annotate

        public static void annotate(Document doc)
        Annotates a Document with coreferential mentions, reads the types to consider come from the configuration.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to annotate

      • annotatePersonalPronouns

        public static void annotatePersonalPronouns(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with personal pronouns (e.g., it, they). Filters out pleonastic it. Assumes that the Sentence object has already been pre-processed for syntax.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotatePossessivePronouns

        public static void annotatePossessivePronouns(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with possessive pronouns (e.g., its, their). Assumes that the Sentence object has already been pre-processed for syntax.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateRelativePronouns

        public static void annotateRelativePronouns(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with relative pronouns (e.g., which, that).
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateDemonstrativePronouns

        public static void annotateDemonstrativePronouns(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with demonstrative pronouns (e.g., these, that). Assumes that the Sentence object has already been pre-processed for syntax.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateDistributivePronouns

        public static void annotateDistributivePronouns(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with distributive pronouns (e.g., each, both).
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateReciprocalPronouns

        public static void annotateReciprocalPronouns(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with reciprocal pronouns (e.g., one another).
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateIndefinitePronouns

        public static void annotateIndefinitePronouns(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with indefinite pronouns (e.g., all, any).
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateDefiniteNPs

        public static void annotateDefiniteNPs(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with definite NPs (e.g., the agent). Assumes that the Sentence object has already been pre-processed for syntax. It won't annotate a textual unit if it is already associated with coreferential mentions.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateIndefiniteNPs

        public static void annotateIndefiniteNPs(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with indefinite NPs (e.g., a disease). Assumes that the Sentence object has already been pre-processed for syntax. It won't annotate a textual unit if it is already associated with coreferential mentions.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateDemonstrativeNPs

        public static void annotateDemonstrativeNPs(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with demonstrative NPs (e.g., these medications). Assumes that the Sentence object has already been pre-processed for syntax. It won't annotate a textual unit if it is already associated with coreferential mentions.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateDistributiveNPs

        public static void annotateDistributiveNPs(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with distributive NPs (e.g., each patient). Assumes that the Sentence object has already been pre-processed for syntax. It won't annotate a textual unit if it is already associated with coreferential mentions.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • annotateZeroArticleNPs

        public static void annotateZeroArticleNPs(Sentence sent)
        Annotates a Sentence object with bare (zero-article) NPs (e.g., drug). Assumes that the Sentence object has already been pre-processed for syntax. It won't annotate a textual unit if it is already associated with coreferential mentions.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to annotate

      • getCoreferenceSemanticItemFactory

        public static CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory getCoreferenceSemanticItemFactory(Document doc)
        Gets a semantic item factory associated with a Document object, capable of generating Expression objects.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document for the semantic item factory
        Returns:
        a semantic item factory, capable of generating coreference objects, or null if no such factory is associated with the document

      • getMentionType

        public static ExpressionType getMentionType(SurfaceElement surf)
        Determines the mention type of a textual unit. This is useful when using gold standard mentions, which typically won't have the fine-grained mention typing assumed in this framework.
        Parameters:
        surf - the textual unit
        Returns:
        the mention type recognized, or ExpressionType#ZeroArticleNP if no type is recognized
